name: Ethereum PoW
description: Ethereum PoW (ETHW) is a decentralized blockchain network that operates using a proof-of-work consensus mechanism. It emerged as a result of the Ethereum network's transition to proof-of-stake (PoS) with the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade, known as 'The Merge'. ETHW allows miners to continue using their existing hardware to mine cryptocurrency, thus catering to those who prefer the traditional mining method over staking. This network maintains the original Ethereum blockchain's features and functionalities, focusing on preserving the community's ethos of decentralization and security. By upholding proof-of-work, ETHW aims to provide an alternative for users and developers who value the mining aspect of blockchain technology. The Ethereum PoW community supports various projects, applications, and smart contracts, making it a versatile platform for developers. ETHW promotes a robust ecosystem that emphasizes transparency, community governance, and resistance to censorship, reflecting the foundational principles of blockchain technology. As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, ETHW positions itself as a significant player, catering to miners and users who wish to maintain an alternative to Ethereum's PoS model.

seo.meta_title: Ethereum PoW (ETHW) | The Original Proof-of-Work Ethereum
seo.meta_description: Explore Ethereum PoW (ETHW), the decentralized blockchain network that continues the legacy of mining on Ethereum. Join a community committed to proof-of-work and decentralized applications.

faq.question: What is Ethereum PoW?
faq.answer: Ethereum PoW is a decentralized blockchain network that uses a proof-of-work consensus mechanism, continuing the mining tradition of Ethereum.

faq.question: Why was Ethereum PoW created?
faq.answer: ETHW was created to provide an alternative for miners and users who prefer the proof-of-work model after Ethereum transitioned to proof-of-stake.

faq.question: What is the main product of Ethereum PoW?
faq.answer: The main product of ETHW is the ETHW token, which can be mined and used within the Ethereum PoW ecosystem.

faq.question: Where can I find more information about Ethereum PoW?
faq.answer: You can visit the official website at https://ethw.org for more information.

faq.question: Is Ethereum PoW decentralized?
faq.answer: Yes, Ethereum PoW is a decentralized network that emphasizes community governance and transparency.
